
Spinner
===
A directive for generating spinner  
  
  
### Parameters
**mac-spinner-size**  
Type: `Integer`  
The size of the spinner (default 16)  
  
**mac-spinner-z-index**  
Type: `Integer`  
The z-index (default inherit)  
  
**mac-spinner-color**  
Type: `String`  
Color of all the bars (default #2f3035)
